template.name: All Fields Windows Update_By Site (csv)
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  allFieldsWindowsUpdates:
    filter:
      agent__site__id: '{{site.id}}'
    limit: 100
    model: winupdate
    only:
    - id
    - agent__id
    - guid
    - kb
    - agent__hostname
    - title
    - installed
    - downloaded
    - description
    - severity
    - categories
    - category_ids
    - kb_article_ids
    - more_info_urls
    - support_url
    - revision_number
    - action
    - result
    - date_installed
